ana šarri x x bēlīya aradka {1}x x x rab kiṣir ummā ana šarri bēlīyāma ša šarru bēlā išpura umma x x x x+x x x x x x x x x x x x ana sik-x x x x x x x x tušella x x x x x x x x enna ana x x x x x x x x-u₂ kî it-x x x x x x x x ṭēmu ša {LU₂}x x x x x x x x x x ana x x x x x x x x x x x tu ra x x x x x x x x x x-ru-ni x x x x x x x x x x ih-ti-x x x x x x x x x x tar x x x x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x x x nišī x x x x x x x x x x ṭe₃-en-x x x x x x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x kî pî annî x x x x x x amat ēkalli x x x x x x x x ana Simani x x x x x x x x ina Kaldu x x x x x x x x māti rabīti ana x x x x x x x x-di {LU₂}ša₂-UGU-x x x x x ittannū u x x x x x x x x x x šarru be-li₂-x x x x x x x
